text: Tini'i se'ijana yini mahakasamandala o prthibi srsti karechena chaya dine, tarapara tini samarohana karalena arasera upare. Tini janena ya prthibira bhetare prabesa kare ebam ya ta theke beriye ase, ara ya akasa theke neme ase ebam ya tate uthe yaya. Ara tini tomadera sange rayechena yekhane'i tomara thaka na kena. Ara tomara ya kara se-sanbandhe allah samyaka drasta.
